datafield.subfield: edited by Ravi Naidu, Volker Birke.
Advances in trace elements in the environment

Permeable reactive barriers : cost-effective and sustainable remediation of groundwater / Ravi Naidu, Dawit N. Bekele, and Volker Birke -- Two decades of application of permeable reactive barriers to groundwater remediation / Scott D. Warner -- Choosing the best design and construction technologies for permeable reactive barriers / Dawit N. Bekele, Ravi Naidu, Volker Birke, and Sreenivasulu Chadalavada -- Groundwater modeling involving PRBs : general aspects, case study / Sreenivasulu Chadalavada, Martin Wegner, and Ravi Naidu -- Impact of trace elements and impurities in technical zero-valent iron brands on reductive dechlorination of chlorinated ethenes in groundwater / Volker Birke, Christine Schuett, Harald Burmeier, and Hans-Jürgen Friedrich -- Fourteen-year assessment of a permeable reactive barrier for treatment of hexavalent chromium and trichloroethylene / Richard T. Wilkin [and four others] -- Sequenced permeable reactive barrier for the pretreatment of nitrate and remediation of trichloroethene / Keely Mundle, Janet Macmillan, and Ben McCarthy -- Organic-based permeable reactive barriers for the treatment of heavy metals, arsenic, and acidity / Ralph D. Ludwig [and four others] -- Effective cleanup of groundwater contaminated with radionuclides using permeable reactive barriers / Franz-Georg Simon and Tamás Meggyes -- Reactive (oxygen) gas barrier and zone technologies / Ronald Giese [and four others] -- Remediation of PAHs, NSO-heterocycles, and related aromatic compounds in permeable reactive barriers using activated carbon / Wolf-Ulrich Palm, Jan Sebastian Mänz, and Wolfgang Ruck -- Case study of PRB application for the remediation of groundwater / James Stening -- Permeable reactive barriers in Europe / Volker Birke and Harald Burmeier.
Access restricted to authorized users and institutions.
Advances in trace elements in the environment.
